metadata.synopsis: Player talks to Allandra Grey, the Flood Tide (High Priestes) that serves the Water Queen. She's somewhat cold and strict. Talking to her will give some information about the funeral that is happening in the temple, and eventually she gives out the quest Waveservant's Demise, where player should investigate the murder of her waveservant.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Load CTY_Main_A2. Talk to Allandra Greygoto -247.283, -258.103

2.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
2.text: Rejoice, sisters, for Umberlee has blessed her humble daughter with a pure death!

63.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
63.text: Her lips blue with her kiss, her lungs full of her quenching word!

23.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
23.text: Umberlee's mercy saved her from a slow, sinking death in the beast's shadow!

58.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
58.text: How dare this beast sully the safety of Grey Harbour!

14.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
14.text: We will find its master and send him struggling into the Bitch Queen's embrace!

74.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
74.text: Not a sweet sleep like Holli's, but a suffocating flood of fruitless gasps and bursting flesh!
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera on corpse of the dead waveservant on an altar; back onto Allandra afterNodeContext: Ecstatic/triumphant

96.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
96.text: You! Supplicant! What tribute do you bring to honour the Wavemother's fallen daughter?
96.context: NodeContext: Pleased by the offering of gold

19.speaker: Player
19.context: NodeContext: Pleased by the offering of gold

12.speaker: Player
12.context: NodeContext: Pleased by the offering of gold

30.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
30.text: A fine offering always appreciated in the eyes of the Wavemother.
30.context: NodeContext: Pleased by the offering of gold

24.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
24.text: A layperson's prayers - crude but earnest.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: I've brought my weapon to help avenge her death.
64.context: NodeContext: Excited by the prospect of revenge

18.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
18.text: Yes! Then you know as well as Umberlee that blood must soon be shed.
18.context: NodeContext: Excited by the prospect of revenge

44.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
44.text: Your tribute is well received. Breathe deep as she permits.
44.context: NodeContext: Pleased by the player's offering to Umberlee

8.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
8.text: Holli, one of Umberlee's beloved waveservants.

37.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
37.text: Blessed Umberlee saw fit to spare her an ignoble death, but her passing was not as the Wavemother intended.

50.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
50.text: It was a beast who took her life - an unnatural one whose very existence is an affront to Umberlee.

34.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
34.text: A wretched metal monstrosity hewn by hubris.

55.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
55.text: A rusting pollutant that bleeds black blood into Umberlee's pristine waters.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: How did Umberlee 'spare her an ignoble death'?

17.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
17.text: The beast struck Holli while she was swimming in Grey Harbour. She was found by some fishermen.

43.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
43.text: She would have suffered a terrible, agonising death had Umberlee not bestowed upon her the mercy of drowning.
43.context: NodeContext: Truly, fanatically believes the drowning was a mercy

45.speaker: Player
45.text: I'm good at slaying beasts - maybe I could help you.
45.context: NodeContext: Keen for the player to help her; confident in Umberlee's bounty

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I have yet to meet a beast I couldn't slay. If you need a hunter, you've found one.
39.context: NodeContext: Keen for the player to help her; confident in Umberlee's bounty

51.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
51.text: The Queen of the Depths is generous to those who serve her - and her favour is far less deadly than her wrath.
51.context: NodeContext: Keen for the player to help her; confident in Umberlee's bounty

89.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
89.text: Find the master of this poisonous beast and slay him - then one of her most precious gifts shall be yours.
89.context: NodeContext: Keen for the player to help her; confident in Umberlee's bounty

57.speaker: Narrator
57.text:
*You're reminded of the man you met beneath the Grey Harbour - and the submersible he
commanded.*
57.context: NodeContext: Dismissive; the player is not worthy of such a fate in her eyes

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *You're reminded of the Banite's submersible. Could they be connected?*
16.context: NodeContext: Dismissive; the player is not worthy of such a fate in her eyes

9.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
9.text: This 'precious gift' isn't drowning, is it?
9.context: NodeContext: Dismissive; the player is not worthy of such a fate in her eyes

10.speaker: Player
10.text: This 'precious gift' isn't drowning, is it?
10.context: NodeContext: Dismissive; the player is not worthy of such a fate in her eyes

65.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
65.text: Pft, that privilege is not yours to earn.
65.context: NodeContext: Dismissive; the player is not worthy of such a fate in her eyes

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Where can I find the beast's master?
25.context: NodeContext: Intense; wants the beast's master gone

54.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
54.text: We haven't found its lair as yet - perhaps you can find where the beast takes its slumber and skewer it before it wakes.
54.context: NodeContext: Intense; wants the beast's master gone

1.speaker: Player
1.text: All right - I'll see what I can do.
1.context: NodeContext: Ecstatic; very glad the player is going to help

26.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
26.text: Salt kiss your brow! We await your return - and the beastmaster's demise.
26.context: NodeContext: Ecstatic; very glad the player is going to help

77.speaker: Player
77.text: I suspect I know the origins of this 'beast'. I'll see what I can do.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: I think I know the master of the 'poisonous beast'. I'll see what I can do.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: The 'beast's master' has been dealt with. You're welcome.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: The 'beast's master' has already left the city - I found his resignation letter. Your waters are safe.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Sorry, I don't have time for this.

0.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
0.text: There is always time for the tides - pray you never get caught in them.

83.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
83.text: There is always time for the tides - pray you never get caught in them.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: I'm not getting involved in this.

85.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
85.text: Then I hope you never have need of the sea's benevolence.

86.speaker: Player
86.text: This is one of the more upbeat funerals I've attended.

21.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
21.text: We are celebrating an act of divine mercy!

75.speaker: Player
75.text: Nice corpse. What are we celebrating?

66.speaker: Player
66.text: I haven't brought any tribute, actually.
66.context: NodeContext: Slightly irritated by the player's lack of an offering

71.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
71.text: Then you'd better have a good reason for approaching so brazenly.
71.context: NodeContext: Slightly irritated by the player's lack of an offering

98.speaker: Player
98.text: I will pray to my god for her salvation.
98.context: NodeContext: first sentence agreeing with player, almost congratulatory (to another zealot who's died a noble death)

15.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
15.text: The other gods do not look kindly on the Bitch Queen - but she looks kindly upon your prayers, priest.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: I wish her soul the stillness of a calmed ocean.
31.context: NodeContext: first sentence agreeing with player, almost congratulatory (to another zealot who's died a noble death)

72.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
72.text: As still as the water in her halted lungs! A most fitting tribute, received with gratitude.
72.context: NodeContext: first sentence agreeing with player, almost congratulatory (to another zealot who's died a noble death)

46.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
46.text: Yes! Rage and rebel against the beast and its master! A tribute most fitting.

6.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
6.text: May the Wavemother grant you her favour - or at least, spare you her wrath.
6.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastically hopeful about the beastmaster's death

60.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
60.text: May the Wavemother grant you her favour - or at least, spare you her wrath.
60.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastically hopeful about the beastmaster's death

70.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
70.text: Is it done? Have you slain the beastmaster?
70.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastically hopeful about the beastmaster's death

49.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
49.context: NodeContext: Exultant on the first sentence, then grateful (and vicious after the -)

79.speaker: Player
79.text: The 'beast's master' left Baldur's Gate - I found his resignation letter. Your waters are safe.
79.context: NodeContext: Exultant on the first sentence, then grateful (and vicious after the -)

42.speaker: Player
42.context: NodeContext: Exultant on the first sentence, then grateful (and vicious after the -)

3.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
3.text: Umberlee smiles on us all! Thank you for enacting her blessed vengeance - may the tides crush his bones to sand.
3.context: NodeContext: Exultant on the first sentence, then grateful (and vicious after the -)

67.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
67.text: As promised. The Wavemother rewards those who submit to her will.
67.context: InternalNodeContext: Receive reward for completing the questNodeContext: Reverently bestowing a reward on the deserving player

80.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
80.text: May the seas be as kind as you deserve.
80.context: NodeContext: A warm - if slightly threatening-sounding - farewell

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Remind me what the beast did to your waveservant.

38.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
38.text: Holli was swimming in Grey Harbour - as we all do. The beast struck her and she lost consciousness - Umberlee eased her passing.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Where can I find this beastmaster again?

52.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
52.text: Then come back when you have. The Wavemother is rarely patient.

76.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
76.text: You have done the Bitch Queen's house a great deed - I pray that when you die, your lungs are blessed with her salted kisses.

82.speaker: Flood Tide Allandra Grey
82.text: Changeable as the sea - have you decided to help after all?
